WorkItem.ClosedComment: This has been Implemented in DPSWarr already
WorkItem.Description:
In the current source, the Improved Berzerker Stance talent has the wrong text and is giving the wrong bonus.
 
In Rawr.Base/ClassTalents.cs the the full 5-point text says +20% attack power, when it should be +20% strength.
 
Rawr.DPSWarr/CalculationsDPSWarr.cs the full 5-point talent is giving +10% attack power, when it should be +20% strength.
 
I'm attaching a small patch that seems to fix the problem.

Comments.Message: Is this simply placed in the data directory of Rawr, or is it necessary to compile this into the program?
It needs to be compiled. I checked in the actual calculation change (earlier this morning, so it's not in the release yet) but I didn't get the talent tooltip change in. I'll go do that now.
This has been implemented in DPSWarr
